name: Sketchfab
overview:
The world is in 3D, but the web we browse everyday is still in 2D… Sketchfab brings 3D to the web. It is the first web service to publish interactive 3D content online in real-time without plugin.

Our product is a universal 3D viewer you can embed on any webpage. It’s a bit like youtube, but for 3D files.

Sketchfab is part of season 3 of the accelerator program “Le Camping” in Paris, among the top 8 startups of the Pioneers Festival 2012, and winner of the CJE Awards 2012 for the digital category.
